org.jgrapes.portal

Class PortalWeblet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.portal.PortalWeblet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType>, org.jgrapes.core.Channel, org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible, org.jgrapes.core.Manager

    public class PortalWeblet
extends org.jgrapes.core.Component

    Provides resources using Request/Response events. Some resource requests (page resource, portlet resource) are forwarded via the Portal component to the portlets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PortalWeblet.LanguageInfo
      Holds the information about the selected language.
      class  PortalWeblet.PortalResourceChannel
      The channel used to send PageResourceRequests and PortletResourceRequests to the portlets (via the portal).
      static class  PortalWeblet.ThemeInfo
      Holds the information about a theme.

    • Method Detail

      • setPortalSessionNetworkTimeout

        public PortalWeblet setPortalSessionNetworkTimeout(long timeout)

        Sets the portal session network timeout. The portal session will be removed if no messages have been received from the portal session for the given number of milliseconds. The value defaults to 45 seconds.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milli seconds
        Returns:
        the portal view for easy chaining

      • setPortalSessionRefreshInterval

        public PortalWeblet setPortalSessionRefreshInterval(long interval)

        Sets the portal session refresh interval. The portal code in the browser will send a keep alive packet if there has been no user activity for more than the given number of milliseconds. The value defaults to 30 seconds.

        Parameters:
        interval - the interval in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the portal view for easy chaining

      • setPortalSessionInactivityTimeout

        public PortalWeblet setPortalSessionInactivityTimeout(long timeout)

        Sets the portal session inactivity timeout. If there has been no user activity for more than the given number of milliseconds the portal code stops sending keep alive packets and displays a message to the user. The value defaults to -1 (no timeout).

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the portal view for easy chaining

      • useMinifiedResources

        public boolean useMinifiedResources()

        Returns whether resources are minified.

        Returns:
        the useMinifiedResources

      • uriFromPath

        public static URI uriFromPath(String path)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException

        Create a URI from a path. This is similar to calling new URI(null, null, path, null) with the URISyntaxException converted to a IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        the uri
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string violates RFC 2396
